alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 8:11PM CDT until September 02 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Jackson, Greene and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, water covers the main road at Plum Bluff in southern George County. At 22 feet, flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. At 23.5 feet, water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 23.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 14.9 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 22 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
